fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

fairy_grenades.name: Fairy grenades
fairy_grenades.description: High Explosive - Not safe for any age.

fairy_snap_pops.name: Fairy Snap Pops
fairy_snap_pops.description: Wimppy noise makers that annoy anyone at any age.

fairy_farts.name: Fairy Farts
fairy_farts.description: It will knock you out, but you'll be happy.

fairy_belchs.name: Fairy belchs
fairy_belchs.description: A loud noise with an equally offending odor.

fairy_screams.name: Fairy Screams
fairy_screams.description: You'll go deaf, but you'll smile.

fairy_knuckles.name: Fairy Knuckles
fairy_knuckles.description: If you don't have the money, you won't have any fingers.

fairy_money.name: Fairy Money
fairy_money.description: Cash is king in fairy land.

fairy_lasers.name: Fairy Lasers
fairy_lasers.description: Fairies with frick'n lasers beams on their head!

fairy_rocketLauncher.name: Fairy Rocket Launcher
fairy_rocketLauncher.description: Getting to the chopper won't help you.

fairy_gatlingGun.name: Fairy Gatling Gun
fairy_gatlingGun.description: You can run, but you'll just die tired.

fairy_schizophrenic.name: Fairy Schizophrenic
fairy_schizophrenic.description: More Fairies in one package, what could go wrong?

fairy_pepperSpray.name: Fairy Pepper Spray
fairy_pepperSpray.description: Bottled Fairy piss in a pressurized container.

fairy_sticks.name: Fairy Sticks
fairy_sticks.description: Enter the Fairy Dragon kung-foo fighting.

fairy_landMines.name: Fairy Land Mines
fairy_landMines.description: For use when your annoying neighbor tip toes through your tulips.

fairy_waterMines.name: Fairy Under Water Mines
fairy_waterMines.description: For when you don't care who's on a boat.

fairy_icbms.name: Fairy ICBMS
fairy_icbms.description: Reach out and touch someone in other country ... and annihilate them.
